name: places/ChIJMetK65JZwokRYNS_yUn4WBQ
formattedAddress: 1 7th Ave S, New York, NY 10014, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1 7th Ave S, New York, NY 10014-3943, USA

originalText.text:
First off I’d like to genuinely say I’m exceptionally in love with this place. Came over few hours ago from someone (@labellajew / Jaz) who posted these fascinating images of food from Gallo Nero in her Instagram stories.

I saw I have to go. Date night worthy! Private. Exquisitely decorated. Cannot forget the “I Feel like at home” ambience and nonetheless, appetizer, dinner, wine, sambuca and dessert were consumed and delightfully impressed.

Definitely returning! My date said we should come here monthly. Jajaja

Miguel Angel is a total sweetheart. Attentive and definitely is a foodie himself. He is also a chef ! Need some guidance amigo.

The owner! Wow! I need to get my Italian lessons from him and appreciate his genuineness, familial loving attitude and patience.

originalText.text: Went to this place on a pulsd deal for brunch. Meals and bottomless drinks for two for a great price. Pretty crowded. Reservation a must, and be on time! Good food, loved the burgers and the margaritas were pretty good!

text.text: Went to this place on a pulsd deal for brunch. Meals and bottomless drinks for two for a great price. Pretty crowded. Reservation a must, and be on time! Good food, loved the burgers and the margaritas were pretty good!

originalText.text: We went here for my best friend's birthday brunch, and they treated us so well. They made sure our mimosas were always full, and even gave us free refills after our "happy hour" time was finished. When I requested they put on the football game I wanted to see, they went out of their way to check every back channel before reluctantly admitting they didnt receive the channel. The food was delicious, and the service was excellent. They were so happy to serve us and were such a great mood. GREAT spot for brunch - and their music is on point.

originalText.text: Absolutely adored our evening here at gallo Nero, the food and service was top notch! The risotto special in the Parmesan cheese wheel made at the table and the filet mignon dish with a sauce I could drink were delicious, we will be coming back for more! A wonderful dinner at restaurant with heart

text.text: Absolutely adored our evening here at gallo Nero, the food and service was top notch! The risotto special in the Parmesan cheese wheel made at the table and the filet mignon dish with a sauce I could drink were delicious, we will be coming back for more! A wonderful dinner at restaurant with heart

originalText.text: We spent our honeymoon in NYC and I can say this was by far the best place we ate. Customer Service was outstanding and they treated us like family. I encourage ANYONE to try out this restaurant, the chef came out multiple times to make sure everything was great. Our waiter made sure we had a wonderful time, and overall best dining experience I've ever had anywhere! My husband and I can't say enough good things!
